description: This is a PHP source file that generates a web-based user interface for managing WAN network settings on a router or gateway device. It includes server-side logic to retrieve device information, control logic for enabling/disabling WAN modes, and client-side JavaScript for interactivity.

methods.name: changeAutoWanMode
methods.description: Handles changing the WAN mode based on user selection, confirms with the user, and performs AJAX POST to update the configuration.

methods.name: saveConfig
methods.description: Sends AJAX request to save the specified WAN network configuration and reloads the page upon success.

methods.name: changeMode
methods.description: Performs AJAX POST request to change the WAN mode configuration and reloads the page upon success.
